body:
Comment 2 by **namegduf**: 
Is there any way I can test this theory, or see any unaffected measures?

I tried looking at "free"'s report of the total free RAM, and using a short "run 
program, wait a second, run free" shell script, I observed a fairly consistent increase 
of ~5MB in used RAM, minus buffers/cache. I'm not sure where else to test to be sure.
